project_descr: The project addresses the need to enhance legal awareness and support services to underprivileged and marginalized populations. Urban populations affected by increased crime and violence will have improved access to legal advice.

outputs.output_descr: The project addresses the need to enhance legal awareness and support services to underprivileged and marginalized populations of Belize.

document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/BLZ/PRODOC- Strengthening legal Aid and Pro bono Services (2).doc
project_title: enhanced access to legal aid and pro bono services
